item.title: Specific player command allowance
item.dc:creator: @Radiationscape Radiationscape
item.description:
@Radiationscape wrote:

hey guys, i just wanted to know how to make it so only a specific player can do a command:

Here is the snipit code of what type of command i want:

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“welcome”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
sendQuest("@dre@Welcome to RadiationScape", 8144); //Title
sendQuest(“Info”, 8145);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“Latest news:”, 8148);
sendQuest("", 8149);
sendQuest(“The server is back online!”, 8150);
sendQuest("", 8151);
sendQuest("", 8152);
sendQuest("", 8153);
sendQuest("", 8154);
sendQuest("", 8155);
sendQuest("", 8156);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();

}[/code]

Now that’s a code for a specific lvl of access for players to use the command

i want to change it so only a specific player can do it.

how do i do this?

Read full topic
